function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation systems increasing the risk of airborne pathogen transmission","Impact":"Higher risk of airborne diseases spreading among people in the built environment","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems to enhance air quality and reduce the concentration of airborne pathogens","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, air purifiers, and air quality monitoring devices","People":"Occupants of buildings and public spaces","Owner":"Building owners, architects, and engineers"},{"Description":"Inadequate design of public spaces increasing the risk of disease transmission","Impact":"Increased likelihood of disease transmission in public spaces with strong social interaction","Mitigation":"Optimizing architectural design to improve air quality and safety in public spaces","Technologies":"Architectural modeling software, airflow simulation tools, and sustainable building materials","People":"Users of public spaces, including visitors and employees","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, and public health officials"}]}
